last_episode_to_air.name: Goodwill Toward Men
last_episode_to_air.overview: A mysterious gifts enters the home of Missy and her family, and there will be no rest for the merry.

name: R. L. Stine's The Haunting Hour
original_name: R. L. Stine's The Haunting Hour
overview: R. L. Stine's The Haunting Hour is a Canadian/American original anthology horror-fantasy series, with episodes each half an hour long. The series is based on The Haunting Hour: Don't Think About It Movie, and the books The Haunting Hour and Nightmare Hour anthology by R. L. Stine.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Season 4 of the series of R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour

episodes.name: Really You (1)
episodes.overview: A girl receives a life-size doll that looks exactly like her.

episodes.name: Really You (2)
episodes.overview: Brandon investigates the doll that thinks for itself.

episodes.name: A Creature Was Stirring
episodes.overview: Timmy deals with a gift he can't get rid of.

episodes.name: The Dead Body
episodes.overview: Will is left in a precarious situation after he makes a deal with his new friend to handle some bullies.

episodes.name: Nightmare Inn
episodes.overview: A girl faces her fears when she moves into a spooky inn with her mother after her father's death.

episodes.name: The Red Dress
episodes.overview: A girl has the opportunity to look her best, but it's at a steep price.

episodes.name: Ghostly Stare
episodes.overview: Mark and Lauren learn that cemeteries should not be disturbed.

episodes.name: Walls
episodes.overview: A family's new home is still inhabited by its former owners.

episodes.name: Game Over
episodes.overview: A mysterious video game puts two gamers' lives in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Alien Candy
episodes.overview: Walt meets a couple of kids who believe they know the trick to communicating with aliens.

episodes.name: Fear Never Knocks
episodes.overview: A psychiatrist's grandchildren face their fears after playing with an ancient recorder found in his office.

episodes.name: Best Friend Forever
episodes.overview: A boy adopts a pet that turns out to be dead.

episodes.name: Black Mask
episodes.overview: Three kids discover a mysterious mask.

episodes.name: Afraid of Clowns
episodes.overview: A boy suspects that he is being stalked by carnival clowns.

episodes.name: My Sister the Witch
episodes.overview: A girl puts her family at risk when she returns from boarding school with a new hobby.

episodes.name: Wrong Number
episodes.overview: A young girl with a bad attitude meets her match when she's disrespectful to the old lady living next door.

episodes.name: Catching Cold
episodes.overview: A boy becomes obsessed with a tasty brand of ice cream.

episodes.name: Pool Shark
episodes.overview: A pool boy at a rec center is haunted by visions of creatures in the water.

episodes.name: Lights Out
episodes.overview: A boy gets in over his head while trying to disprove the existence of ghosts.

episodes.name: The Perfect Brother
episodes.overview: A boy's formerly perfect sibling starts messing up.

episodes.name: Scary Mary (1)
episodes.overview: A girl and her friends wrangle with Scary Mary after conjuring her with a chant into a mirror.

episodes.name: Scary Mary (2)
episodes.overview: A group of kids deal with the consequences of summoning Scary Mary.

episodes.name: Creature Feature (Part 1)
episodes.overview: A classic film lover named John (Joel Courtney) gets sucked into a 1950s B-movie called I Was A Teenage Tick Monster playing at a haunted drive-in.

episodes.name: Creature Feature (Part 2)
episodes.overview: Nathan and Lisa get sucked inside the B-movie to rescue John and stop the evil Dr. Mangle from releasing his creation on the world.

episodes.name: Swarmin' Norman
episodes.overview: A bullied boy named Norman discovers that he has god-like power over insects and uses them to get revenge on his tormentors – only to discover (the hard way) that absolute power corrupts absolutely.

episodes.name: Flight
episodes.overview: A boy named Josh on his first flight learns that the Grim Reaper (posing as an old woman) is a fellow passenger and an undead man only the boy can see is trying to escape her.

episodes.name: Pumpkinhead
episodes.overview: A girl and her brothers investigate a pumpkin patch said to be tended to by a murderous farmer who kidnaps children and switches their heads with the pumpkins in his gardens.

episodes.name: Brush with Madness
episodes.overview: When comic book geek Corey gets yelled at by his favorite artist Allan Miller (Mackenzie Gray) during a comic book convention, Corey steals Allan's brushes and comes up with his own creation – only to learn that Allan's brushes have the power to turn fantasy into reality.

episodes.name: Sick
episodes.overview: Alex has to stay home from school, thanks to a bad cold – and soon finds that he's not alone in the house. To make matters worse, two morning news show anchors begin talking to him from the television, warning him that his mom and the government are out to kill him for being ill (along with the monster in the house that may have sickened the boy to start with). Is Alex really in danger or is this all a fever dream?

episodes.name: Mascot
episodes.overview: Willie and his friend Drake hate their school mascot Big Yellow and decide to have it replaced with a wolf....which doesn't sit well with Big Yellow himself.

episodes.name: Bad Feng Shui
episodes.overview: A Chinese girl named Jessica hates how strict her mother is right down to rearranging her room. When Jessica decides to arrange the room the way she wants it, dark forces begin haunting her house and she turns to Mr. Ming on how to set things right.

episodes.name: The Hole
episodes.overview: Rob and Carrie's family move to a new house which they find by the help of a video is haunted by a father who went insane during a barbecue and killed his family in a car wreck.

episodes.name: Scarecrow
episodes.overview: A farmer named Jenny has trouble ridding her crops of an infestation of crows, so she buys a scarecrow from a mysterious salesman -- and soon discovers that the scarecrow has the power to scare more than crows.

episodes.name: Dreamcatcher
episodes.overview: The camp legend of a mysterious creature who feeds on nightmares appears to be true after a cabin full of girls have a recurring nightmare that terrorizes them so badly, it leaves them unable to sleep.

episodes.name: The Most Evil Sorcerer (Part 1)
episodes.overview: In a medieval English town ruled under a corrupt sorcerer, two teens, Ned and Sara, set out to dethrone the sorcerer and rid him of his magic.

episodes.name: The Most Evil Sorcerer (Part 2)
episodes.overview: When Ned and Sara discover that the sorceress who helped them dethrone the evil sorcerer was the one who taught him black magic, Ned takes revenge against the sorceress, and Sara worries that Ned's obsession to learn magic may drive them apart.

episodes.name: Stage Fright
episodes.overview: A high school drama club is doing a play based on the story of Hansel and Gretel, but the cast suspects their drama teacher of being a witch after several misfortunes befall the cast and one of the props is revealed to be a real working oven.

episodes.name: Night of the Mummy
episodes.overview: When a rare Egyptian exhibit comes to town, Seth discovers a horrible secret that connects him with the mummy of The Boy Pharaoh.

episodes.name: Headshot
episodes.overview: An ice cream shop girl named Gracie Wilde dreams of being the prettiest face in the world -- a wish that a ruthless teen magazine photographer named Cassandra is more than willing to grant Gracie. As Gracie gets more famous, her character begins to change.

episodes.name: The Return of Lilly D
episodes.overview: The evil doll Lilly D. (from the series premiere "Really You") is being beaten up by boys when a young girl named Natalie takes her home to her grandfather.

episodes.name: Grampires (Part 1)
episodes.overview: When Mike (Mitchell Kummen) and Cristen (Chanelle Peloso) visit their grandpa (Christopher Lloyd) at his retirement community, they soon discover why its residents only come out at night as the grandpa and it's inhabitants are actually vampires.

episodes.name: Grampires (Part 2)
episodes.overview: The grandpa must protect and save his grandchildren from the bloodthirsty residents of his retirement community.

episodes.name: The Cast
episodes.overview: When Lex (Robert Capron) rats out his friends for egging the house of a mysterious cat lady, her cats begin to follow him and take interest in his increasingly itchy arm cast.

episodes.name: The Weeping Woman
episodes.overview: Chi (Rico Rodriguez) learns the scary folk tale of the child-stealing river witch called "La Llorona." He soon comes face to face with the terrifying creature and must defeat her to save his friends.

episodes.name: Intruders
episodes.overview: A young girl, who's been unhappy ever since the birth of her baby brother, makes a deal with a seemingly harmless forest creature who promises to give the girl a better life with a new family in exchange for her baby brother.

episodes.name: Spaceman
episodes.overview: Aaron (Will Shadley) is a lonely boy who is given a toy space helmet by a neighborhood woman. The helmet begins receiving calls, however there are no batteries in it.

episodes.name: Red Eye
episodes.overview: It's always a good day for Georgia (Mackenzie Foy) when she gets a postcard from her traveling father away in another country, but soon she has reason to believe that he is being followed by someone and decides to figure out what's going on before it's too late.

episodes.name: My Imaginary Friend
episodes.overview: Shawn (Ryan Lee) is happy to make friends with a mysterious being named Travis, but soon the two are faced with a dilemma when Shawn's brother begins to butt heads with Travis, who just so happens to be an imaginary being, and perhaps even a ghost.

episodes.name: Poof de Fromage
episodes.overview: Bobby (Quinn Lord) and his family are housing a French exchange student, Jean-Louis (Vincent Martella) for a year, but a chain of strange happenings make Bobby suspect that his French exchange student may be an alien.

episodes.name: The Golem (Part 1)
episodes.overview: Jeremy and Bonnie are saddened to learn of the passing of their grandmother and travel to her homeland of Russia to spread her ashes. But soon after they arrive, a bewildering secret is uncovered from their grandmother's past.

episodes.name: The Golem (Part 2)
episodes.overview: After arriving to his late grandmother's homeland of Russia to spread her ashes, Jeremy must use what he knows about a certain secret from her past to save the village and his sister from a malevolent threatening being.

episodes.name: The Girl in the Painting
episodes.overview: When a girl in a painting captures the attention of Becky (Bailee Madison), she becomes enthralled with the image and does everything she can to mirror the life and surroundings of the painted figure, but she soon realizes that things aren't as they seem.

episodes.name: Checking Out
episodes.overview: Jeremy (Matthew Knight) & Chelsea get out of a family vacation with mom & dad. When the family stumbles upon a creepy hotel where parents mysteriously forget that they have kids, Jeremy & Chelsea have to fight to keep their family together.

episodes.name: Terrible Love
episodes.overview: Hopelessly infatuated with a boy who seems to have more important things to do than pay any attention to her, a girl commissions Cupid to cast his spell on him but with two times the normal strength, inevitably leading to a terrifying obsession.

episodes.name: Séance
episodes.overview: A group of kids hold a ritual in their attic to contact a ghost and unfortunately, it becomes much more than just a kid's game.

episodes.name: Detention
episodes.overview: A group of students must spend the afternoon together in detention, where they must each face the truth of why they're really there or else be stuck in school forever.

episodes.name: The Funhouse
episodes.overview: Two kids make a pact to stick together, but problems arise when one of them goes into a fun house and his dark thoughts begin to overpower him.

episodes.name: Worry Dolls
episodes.overview: A girl receives worry dolls from her busy parents, and soon whatever she frets about becomes real.

episodes.name: Lovecraft's Woods
episodes.overview: Three kids try to save time on their route by venturing into the woods, where an odd force begins to follow them.

episodes.name: Coat Rack Cowboy
episodes.overview: The spirit of a cowboy convict returns when the tree that he was hanged on is cut down.

episodes.name: Long Live Rock and Roll
episodes.overview: Holden buys a new guitar that will apparently make him into the rock star he wants to be, but he might have just traded for his soul.

episodes.name: Dead Bodies
episodes.overview: Will made a deal with a ghost months ago. Now a ghost himself, he sets out to save his ex-girlfriend from the same fate.

episodes.name: My Robot
episodes.overview: Philip has his own robot, and while that sounds cool, it has certain... drawbacks.

episodes.name: Bad Egg
episodes.overview: Jason, a problem child, is given one more chance. Then he's accidentally given a monster.

episodes.name: Toy Train
episodes.overview: When Logan and his dad are tasked with cleaning out his grandfather's house, the ghosts of secrets long past come back to haunt them.

episodes.name: Uncle Howee
episodes.overview: Jared tries to turn off an annoying kids show, but shutting off the TV isn't doing the trick.

episodes.name: I'm Not Martin
episodes.overview: A hospital patient set to get his tonsils removed, but fears the cursed hospital may have other plans that include amputating his foot.

episodes.name: Grandpa's Glasses
episodes.overview: A curious boy accompanies his mother to his deceased grandfather's home. After trying on his grandfather's glasses, he realizes they may not be alone in the house as a sinister spirit seems to be lurking about.

episodes.name: My Old House
episodes.overview: Alice is lured back into her old Victorian house for one more night.

episodes.name: Mrs. Worthington
episodes.overview: Nate finds himself in trouble when he imagines his sister being punished for her bullying.

episodes.name: Return of the Pumpkinheads
episodes.overview: Karen and Zach's family moves to the same farm that once belonged to evil old man Palmer and his creatures.

episodes.name: Near Mint Condition
episodes.overview: Ted's obsession with online auctions threatens more than just his money stash.

episodes.name: Argh V
episodes.overview: Sam's parents latest impulse buy takes them on a road tip to an unfamiliar area.

episodes.name: Lotsa Luck
episodes.overview: Gregory looks to the legends of his Irish heritage to turn his bad luck around.

episodes.name: Spores
episodes.overview: While on a hike in the woods, strange things begin to happen to Melvin's family.

episodes.name: Goodwill Toward Men
episodes.overview: A mysterious gifts enters the home of Missy and her family, and there will be no rest for the merry.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Season 4 of the series of R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour
